title: Alex Padilla - Wikipedia
snippet: Alejandro "Alex" Padilla (born March 22, 1973) is an American politician serving as the senior United States senator from California, a seat he has held since 2021. A member of the Democratic Party, Padilla served as the 30th secretary of state of California from 2015 to 2021 and was a member ...

title: Alex Padilla - Ballotpedia
snippet: Alex Padilla (Democratic Party) is a member of the U.S. Senate from California. He assumed office on January 20, 2021. His current term ends on January 3, 2029.

title: About Alex - Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: In November of 2022, Alex was elected to the United States Senate. He began serving in January of 2021 after being appointed to fill the vacancy created by the election of Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: U.S. Senate: U.S. Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: Alex was sworn in as California’s first Latino Secretary of State on January 5, 2015 and was re-elected in 2018, receiving the most votes of any Latino elected official in the United States. As Secretary of State, Alex worked to make our elections more accessible and inclusive, while fighting ...

title: Alex Padilla (D) - District 20 | California State Senate Archive
snippet: Padilla was not only the first Latino, but the youngest person ever elected city council president.
